long_description: Keep your little guy styling all summer long in the adorable Pediped Joshua sandals. Smooth leather uppers feature canvas accent straps; rip-and-stick straps make them easy to slip on and off. Smooth leather linings let little feet slide into sandals with ease. Memory foam topsoles conform to little feet for comfort. The Pediped Joshua sandals feature rubber outsoles for traction on varied surfaces; to help new walkers, soles feature rounded edges to mimic the shape of their feet.
short_description: Keep your little guy styling all summer long in the adorable Pediped Joshua sandals.
